channel.title: NPC's won't appear
channel.description: I don't know if this is server sided, or client sided. But the NPC's won't appear when I spawn them in. They show up on the mini-map but don't show up in-game? Any help? Model header problem possibly? . . idk .

item.title: NPC's won't appear
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
@iHype wrote:

I don’t know if this is server sided, or client sided. But the NPC’s won’t appear when I spawn them in. They show up on the mini-map but don’t show up in-game? Any help? Model header problem possibly? . . idk .

Read full topic
